CustomField.formula: IF ( Stimulan_Value__c > 0, Account.Account_Alias__c & '/' & Surgeon__r.LastName & '/Stimulan', IF ( Genex_Value__c > 0, Account.Account_Alias__c & '/' & Surgeon__r.LastName & '/Genex', IF ( Sports_Medicine_Value__c > 0, Account.Account_Alias__c & '/' & Surgeon__r.LastName & '/Sports', IF ( Allogran_Value__c > 0, Account.Account_Alias__c & '/' & Surgeon__r.LastName & '/Allogran', left(Account.Name,5) & '/' & Account.Account_Alias__c & '/No Value'))))
CustomField.label: Opportunity Title
